Name: Elizabeth Fry Society of Greater Vancouver - Maida Duncan Drop-In Centre
Description: Offers marginalized women a place to go for hot lunches, showers, laundry, free clothing and household items, as well social activities and education upgrading.

Name: Union Gospel Mission
Hours: Breakfast Service: Monday-Friday, 8:30 am - 9:30 am, Soup Service: Monday-Friday, 11:15 am - 12:00 pm
